title: Our love of Netflix and Prime Video is suffocating Planet Earth
author: desire-athow
summary: Effective file compression could be the key to limiting the environmental impact of video streaming.
article: With more people streaming video content over the internet than ever, especially during the pandemic, data centers are working in overdrive to support demand.
However, with fierce competition between streaming rivals placing speed and video quality at the top of the priority list, few are considering the potential impact on the environment.

To find out more, TechRadar Pro spoke to Guido Meardi, CEO at UK-based V-Nova, a company that claims to have developed a solution that will dramatically enhance compression formats, to hear more about the delicate balance required to satisfy the call for improved video quality and the need to build a sustainable future.
